meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Take</kanji> children from their homes and <kanji>squeeze</kanji> all their talent out until they have nothing left. That's called <vocabulary>exploitation</vocabulary>, and lots of companies make money off of it. It's not very nice though.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
